name: AstroLizard
description:
You have crashlanded your ship on an unknown planet. Explore and complete quests to find your way back to the ship.

AstroLizard was the last game our group Hot Spring Monkeys made at The Game Assembly Malmö in 9 weeks before we headed into the games industry

Here's a progress video if you are interested in seeing our game transform between Alpha-Beta-Gold
